data.title: How do I participate?
data.descr:
You can participate to 'stc Swipe & Win' game by:
Entering the game via my stc BH app menu

data.title: What is the duration of the game?
data.descr: The game is ongoing and all stc users can play 1 game daily for free!

data.title: What are the prizes?
data.descr:
Swipe & Win game gives away:

  • 1 iphone 11 for Ramadan
  • 1 GB mobile data for 300 points in a day from correct questions
  • 2 GB mobile data for 2,000 total points from correct questions
  • 3 GB mobile data for 3,000 total points from correct questions
Chances for draws with amazing Cash, Gold or Car prizes at the end of the game!

data.title: If I win how will I be informed?
data.descr: The winner will be contacted by stc in the next days as to explain the process needed. So do not worry, just keep your phone on.

data.title: How many times may I win each prize?
data.descr: A participant may win each of the big prizes only once.Regarding the telecom prizes users may win multiple times.

data.title: Where can I see Winners & Prizes updates?
data.descr: There are special Game Prizes & Game Winners sections in the menu of the game, where you will find all the information you need!

data.title: How can I change the language of participation?
data.descr: If you are participating in English and you want to switch to Arabic, or the other way around, just change the language from the App Menu

data.title: What are the Swipe & Win game rules?
data.descr:
Each game lasts for 60 seconds.

Each question is consisted of a statement and a photo.

User has to Swipe right for Correct or left for Wrong.

Be careful! Every wrong reply deducts 5 seconds from the remaining time!

During a game round, special questions may also be served such as bronze, silver and golden ones.

data.title: How do I collect points?
data.descr: For every Swipe & Win question that you reply correctly, you gain: 10 points.If you are fast enough, you get bonus points from answering special questions:50 points for each Bronze question, 100 points for each Silver question, 150 points for every Golden question. So, keep playing!

data.title: Does my Swipe & Win game and points expire?
data.descr: The Swipe & Win game expires at the end of the calendar day if not consumed until then. The collected points don't expire.

data.title: I played my daily game, can I add more?
data.descr: Each user may play only 1 free game per day.

data.title: I'm not a stc subscriber, may I participate to the game?
data.descr: No, if you are not a stc subscriber unfortunately you cannot participate to the game.

END.NOMORE: You don't have other games left.
